system.effect: A grazing blow to the head disorientates the target. He suffers a -10 penalty to all tests (except Toughness tests) for 1 round.

description.value:
Energy Damage to Head (Severity 1)

A grazing blow to the head disorientates the target. He suffers a -10 penalty to all tests (except Toughness tests) for 1 round.
